text: #COVID19: This woman is 84 y/o (pic w/perm). She was a single mom, taught 10,000s English Lit & directed Shakespeare for people now Univ Deans & CEOs. At 50 y/o she ran youth shelter for teens & made $18k/year ❤️ She’s my mom & I miss her. #VACCINE = #pandemic #hope #medtwitter https://t.co/8wTnwtq2eL
